headline: Boston Properties: Winner In The Office REITs Space
summary: Discover why Boston Properties (BXP) is undervalued and poised for growth amid strong fundamentals, leasing momentum, and AI-driven office demand.

headline: BXP Announces Closing of $465 Million Financing for The Hub on Causeway
summary: BOSTON, October 09, 2025--BXP, Inc. (NYSE: BXP), the largest publicly traded developer, owner, and manager of premier workplaces in the United States, together with its joint venture partner, Delaware North, announced the closing of a $465.0 million, 5.5-year, non-recourse mortgage loan secured by the podium and office tower at The Hub on Causeway in Boston, Massachusetts.
